Cheatsheets for quick reference¶

If you want to have a list of all SimPy commands, their syntax and parameters for your desktop, print out a copy of the SimPy Cheatsheets you are interested in. Alternative, bookmark them in your favorite browser.

The Cheatsheets available are:

Non-OO (traditional) SimPy API:¶

  • Excel A4 page
  • Excel Letter page
  • PDF A4 page
  • PDF Letter page

Advanced OO API:¶

  • OO Excel A4 page
  • OO Excel Letter page
  • OO PDF A4 page
  • OO PDF Letter page

    • Advanced OO API:
